text: Neighbours from Hell is a puzzle strategy game for Microsoft Windows, GameCube, Xbox, Nintendo DS, Android, iOS, macOS, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It was released for Windows on June 20, 2003, in Europe. It has its own TV show of the same name. title: Neighbours from Hell
